// KafkaTemplate
public static KafkaTemplate<String, String> configureKafkaTemplate(String bootstrapServers)

[TARGET_IMPLEMENTATION] - ç¦æ­¢ä¿®æ”¹
ç›®æ ‡å®ç°ä»£ç ï¼ˆä¸å¯ä¿®æ”¹ï¼‰ï¼š
public static KafkaTemplate<String, String> configureKafkaTemplate(String bootstrapServers) {
        Map<String, Object> config = new HashMap<>();
        config.put(ProducerConfig.BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS_CONFIG, bootstrapServers);
        config.put(ProducerConfig.KEY_SERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG, StringSerializer.class);
        config.put(ProducerConfig.VALUE_SERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG, StringSerializer.class);

        ProducerFactory<String, String> producerFactory = new DefaultKafkaProducerFactory<>(config);
        return new KafkaTemplate<>(producerFactory);
    }

[FINAL_CODE_WITH_LINE_NUMBERS] - æœ€ç»ˆçŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆå¸¦è¡Œå·å’Œæ ‡æ³¨ï¼‰
ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯æœ€ç»ˆå®Œæ•´ä»£ç çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œæ¯è¡Œéƒ½æœ‰è¡Œå·æ ‡æ³¨ï¼Œå¹¶æ ‡æ³¨äº†ç¦æ­¢ä¿®æ”¹çš„åŒºåŸŸï¼š
  1: @Service
  2: @Slf4j
  3: public class KafkaProducerService {
  4: 
  5:     private final KafkaTemplate<String, String> kafkaTemplate;
  6: 
  7:     public KafkaProducerService(KafkaTemplate<String, String> kafkaTemplate) {
  8:         this.kafkaTemplate = kafkaTemplate;
  9:     }
 10: 
 11:     /**
 12:      * å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯åˆ° Kafka æŒ‡å®šä¸»é¢˜

 17:      * @throws IllegalArgumentException å¦‚æœä¸»é¢˜ä¸ºç©ºæˆ–æ— æ•ˆ
 18:      */
 19:     public ListenableFuture<?> sendMessage(String topic, String key, String message) {
 20:         if (topic == null || topic.trim().isEmpty()) {
 21:             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Topic must not be null or empty");
 22:         }
 23:         return kafkaTemplate.send(topic, key, message);
 24:     }
 25: 
 26:     /**
 27:      * å¸¦å›è°ƒçš„æ–¹æ³•
 28:      *
 29:      * @param topic
 30:      * @param key
 31:      * @param message
 32:      * @param successCallback
 33:      * @param failureCallback
 34:      */
 35:     public void sendWithCallback(String topic, String key, String message, Runnable successCallback,
 36:         Runnable failureCallback) {
 37:         ListenableFuture<?> future = sendMessage(topic, key, message);
 38:         future.addCallback(result -> successCallback.run(), ex -> failureCallback.run());
 39:     }
 40: public static KafkaTemplate<String, String> configureKafkaTemplate(String bootstrapServers) { // [ç¦æ­¢ä¿®æ”¹-ç›®æ ‡å®ç°]
